data.title: University of Texas Athletics
data.meta_description:
Byron Murphy II (90) DL  - 





A three-year defensive lineman who played in 39 games with 16 starts ... named a 2023 second-team All-American by the Associated
data.text:
A three-year defensive lineman who played in 39 games with 16 starts ... named a 2023 second-team All-American by the Associated Press and Sporting News … the 2023 Big 12 Defensive Lineman of the Year … a first-team All-Big 12 selection in 2023 by the conference’s coaches, AP and Phil Steele … earned honorable mention Big 12 Defensive Freshman of the Year in 2021 ... selected to the Academic All-Big 12 First Team in 2022 ... named to the 2023 Academic All-Big 12 Second Team ... 2021-22 Academic All-Big 12 Rookie Team honoree ... three-time member of the Big 12 Commissioner’s Honor Roll (fall 2021, spring 2022, spring 2023).

JUNIOR (2023)

Named a 2023 second-team All-American by the Associated Press, Sporting News, CBS Sports, ESPN, FOX Sports, Sports Illustrated, The Athletic, Athlon Sports and Pro Football Focus … Big 12 Defensive Lineman of the Year … a first-team All-Big 12 selection by the conference’s coaches, AP and Phil Steele … tabbed All-Texas First Team by Dave Campbell’s Texas Football … selected third-team All-American by Phil Steele … played in and started all 14 games … established career highs with 29 tackles (13 solo), 8.5 tackles for loss, five sacks and seven quarterback hurries … also scored two offensive touchdowns with one TD reception and one TD rush … became the first Texas offensive or defensive lineman with multiple offensive touchdowns … had three tackles, half a sack and a quarterback hurry in the season-opener against Rice … made two tackles (one solo) and one quarterback hurry at No. 3 Alabama … recorded two tackles and one QB hurry against Wyoming … caught a 1-yard touchdown pass from Quinn Ewers, becoming the fourth Longhorn lineman to score an offensive touchdown and first since OT Sam Cosmi in 2019 … collected a season-high four tackles (four solo), three tackles for loss and two sacks at Baylor … tallied three tackles (one solo) against Kansas … had a solo tackle in the Red River Rivalry against Oklahoma … registered two tackles (one solo) and one tackle for loss at Houston … tallied three quarterback hurries against BYU … recorded two tackles, half a tackle for loss and one QB hurry against Kansas State … posted three tackles (one solo), 1.5 tackles for loss and one sack at TCU … made two tackles (one solo), 1.5 tackles for loss and 1.5 sacks at Iowa State … collected two solo tackles in the Big 12 Championship Game victory over Oklahoma State … had three tackles (one solo) including half a tackle for loss against Washington in the Sugar Bowl … also had a 1-yard touchdown run against the Huskies … selected to the Midseason All-America Second Team by the AP and the Midseason All-America Third Team by Pro Football Focus … Reese’s Senior Bowl invitee … named to the preseason watch list for the Lonestar Player of the Year ... selected Preseason All-Big 12 ... chosen fourth-team Preseason All-American and first-team Preseason All-Big 12 by Athlon Sports.

SOPHOMORE (2022)

Played in 13 games with one start … totaled 26 tackles (nine solo), three tackles for loss, one sack and two quarterback hurries ... recorded two tackles (one solo) in a season-opening victory over ULM … had two tackles (one solo) against Alabama … registered two tackles and half a tackle for loss versus UTSA … made a career-high five tackles and four solo tackles in a start at Texas Tech … tallied three tackles (one solo) with one tackle for loss against West Virginia … recorded one sack for a seven-yard loss in a shutout victory over Oklahoma in the Red River Showdown … registered three tackles and half a tackle for loss at Oklahoma State … had one tackle against TCU … registered three tackles (one solo tackle) at Kansas … made one tackle versus Baylor ... had three tackles and a career-high two quarterback hurries in the Alamo Bowl against Washington.

FRESHMAN (2021)

Named honorable mention Big 12 Defensive Freshman of the Year … played in all 12 games with one start … registered 15 tackles (10 solo), 3.5 tackles for loss and two sacks … made his debut in the season-opening win over Louisiana … tallied his first two career tackles at Arkansas … had two tackles (one solo) and a sack for a 5-yard loss against Rice … collected two tackles (one solo) versus Texas Tech … recorded two tackles (one solo) and a tackle for loss at TCU … posted a career-high three solo tackles at Baylor … notched three tackles (one solo), 1.5 tackles for loss and one sack at Iowa State … made one tackle versus Kansas.
